import requests
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
import pandas as pd
from lxml import etree
def itemQuery():
Â Â url = 'http://ro321.com/index.php?page=item_db&item_type=11'
Â Â res = requests.get(url)
Â Â print(res.content)
Â Â soup = BeautifulSoup(res.content, "html.parser")
Â Â table = soup.find_all('table', attrs={"class": "content_box_item"}).decode()
Â Â print(table)
Â Â print(type(table))
Â Â df = pd.read_html(table, encoding='utf-8', header=0)
Â Â results = list(df.T.to_dict().values())
Â Â print(results)
Â Â df.to_csv("./item.csv", index=False)
if __name__ =="__main__":

import requests
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
import pandas as pd
from lxml import etree
import chardet
def getTableText():
Â Â url = "http://ro321.com/index.php?page=item_db&item_type=11"
Â Â res = requests.get(url)
Â Â res.encoding='gbk'
Â Â res_elements = etree.HTML(res.text,parser=etree.HTMLParser(encoding='gbk'))
Â Â id=res_elements.xpath('string(//table[@width="720px"]/tr[@class="lmd"]/td/table/tr/td)')
Â Â print(id)
Â Â purchaseprice=res_elements.xpath('string(//table[@width="720px"]/tr/td)')
Â Â print(purchaseprice)
Â Â weight=res_elements.xpath('string(//table[@width="720px"]/tr/td)')
Â Â print(weight)
Â Â functionInstruction=res_elements.xpath('string(//table[@width="720px"]/tr/td)')
Â Â print(functionInstruction)
Â Â drops=res_elements.xpath('string(//table[@width="720px"]/tr/td/table)')
Â Â print(drops)
Â Â altAcquire=res_elements.xpath('string(//table[@width="720px"]/tr/td)')
Â Â print(altAcquire)
if __name__ =="__main__":
Â Â getTableText()

import requests
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
import pandas as pd
from lxml import etree
import chardet
def getTableText():
Â  Â  url = "http://ro321.com/index.php?page=item_db&item_type=11"
Â  Â  res = requests.get(url)
Â  Â  res.encoding='gbk'
Â  Â  res_elements = etree.HTML(res.text,parser=etree.HTMLParser(encoding='gbk'))
Â  Â  id=res_elements.xpath('string(//table[@width="720px"]/tr[@class="lmd"]/td/table/tr/td)')
Â  Â  print(id)
Â  Â  purchaseprice=res_elements.xpath('string(//table[@width="720px"]/tr/td)')
Â  Â  print(purchaseprice)
Â  Â  weight=res_elements.xpath('string(//table[@width="720px"]/tr/td)')
Â  Â  print(weight)
Â  Â  functionInstruction=res_elements.xpath('string(//table[@width="720px"]/tr/td)')
Â  Â  print(functionInstruction)
Â  Â  drops=res_elements.xpath('string(//table[@width="720px"]/tr/td/table)')
Â  Â  print(drops)
Â  Â  altAcquire=res_elements.xpath('string(//table[@width="720px"]/tr/td)')
Â  Â  print(altAcquire)
if __name__ =="__main__":
Â  Â  getTableText()
